abstract: I usually think of superzoom cameras as ideal for vacations. I just didn’t know how exemplary until I packed a Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ35, with an 18X zoom lens, for a trip to Vienna.
snippet: I usually think of superzoom cameras as ideal for vacations. I just didn’t know how exemplary until I packed a Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ35, with an 18X zoom lens, for a trip to Vienna.
lead_paragraph: I usually think of superzoom cameras as ideal for vacations. I just didn’t know how exemplary until I packed a Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ35, with an 18X zoom lens ($399, $322 at Amazon), for a trip to Vienna a couple of weeks ago.

headline.main: A Camera Delivers the Joys of Auto Pilot
headline.print_headline: A Camera Delivers The Joys of Auto Pilot
